title: What Happens When TikTok Is Your Marketing Department
excerpt: The Pink Stuff, a home cleaning paste, went from total obscurity to viral sensation — and Walmart staple — thanks to one “cleanfluencer” and her legion of fans.

title: 9 Types of Influencer Marketing Campaigns
excerpt: How, exactly, should ecommerce marketers use influencers? Blog posts, social media, videos, other? We explain nine types of proven campaigns.
